rows.business_item_short_description: Cloud computing services offered by Google Cloud segment.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Google Cloud segment provides cloud computing services, focusing on cloud-based products and services. These services are part of the segment's infrastructure offerings.
rows.evidence_span: Google Cloud segment includes cloud computing services and infrastructure offerings.

rows.business_item_short_description: Infrastructure offerings provided by Google Cloud segment.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Google Cloud segment offers infrastructure offerings as part of its cloud-based products and services. These offerings support the cloud computing services provided by the segment.
rows.evidence_span: Google Cloud segment includes cloud computing services and infrastructure offerings.

rows.business_item: Google Search and other related services
rows.business_item_short_description: Consumer-facing search engine and related services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Google Search and other related services provide users with access to information through a powerful search engine and associated tools. These services form a core part of Google's consumer offerings.
rows.evidence_span: This includes Google Search and other related services, YouTube advertising, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices.

rows.business_item_short_description: Advertising services on the YouTube platform.
rows.business_item_long_description: YouTube advertising offers advertisers the ability to reach audiences through video ads on the YouTube platform. It is a significant revenue driver within the Google Services segment.
rows.evidence_span: This includes Google Search and other related services, YouTube advertising, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices.

rows.business_item_long_description: Google Network provides advertising services across a network of partner sites and platforms, enabling advertisers to extend their reach beyond Google's own properties.
rows.evidence_span: This includes Google Search and other related services, YouTube advertising, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices.

rows.business_item_short_description: Subscription services, platforms, and devices offered by Google.
rows.business_item_long_description: This category includes various subscription-based services, digital platforms, and hardware devices provided by Google to consumers and advertisers, contributing to the segment's revenue growth.
rows.evidence_span: This includes Google Search and other related services, YouTube advertising, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices.
